Born

Submit Corrections

Related Blog Posts

  • If Metallica Let AllMusic Write a Setlist

King Diamond

Biography by Greg Prato

+ Follow Artist

Danish occult rocker who first rose to prominence as a member of gothic black metal group Mercyful Fate before launching a solo career in 1986.
